ui.title: Social & Mental Health Services
ui.subtitle: Immediate access to non-law-enforcement professional support. These resources are dedicated to providing safety and care.
ui.takedown_promo: Need help with a formal takedown request instead?

intouch.name: InTouch Community Services
intouch.description: Quality mental health services including counseling, support groups, and professional training.

dswd.name: Department of Social Welfare and Development (DSWD)
dswd.description: Crisis centers and 24/7 hotlines for victims of violence and those in crisis.

lunas.name: Lunas Collective
lunas.description: A volunteer-powered care space for women and members and allies of the LGBTQIA+ community who have experienced gender-based violence or have sexual and reproductive health concerns.
lunas.note: Specifically for women and LGBTQIA+ community.

bantay_bata.name: Bantay Bata Helpline 163
bantay_bata.description: Responds to reports of child abuse, exploitation, and neglect, and connects callers with appropriate agencies.
bantay_bata.note: Specialized for child abuse and exploitation.

ncmh.name: National Center for Mental Health (NCMH) Crisis Line
ncmh.description: 24/7 crisis hotline providing mental health support and intervention services.

tawag_paglaum.name: Tawag Paglaum - Centro Bisaya
tawag_paglaum.description: A 24-hour, seven days a week call-based mental health helpline providing services in English and Filipino.

rapha.name: Rapha Helpline
rapha.description: A safe world for children free from sexual abuse and exploitation. Free online mental health support services.
